In a message dated 7/21/00 8:50:54 AM Pacific Daylight Time, 
cyberwolf4@... writes:

<< Teleportation should be restricted based on range not banned. Skywarp 
 could teleport short distances, the beast machines mirage can too, 
 try to use this input before making a final judgement. >>


Yes, yes, yes I know very well about Skywarp.  Hell, they even had Starscream 
do it once that I saw in "Divide and Conquer", but the point is, I've 
personally spoken to Yanshosh about this subject a few days before my 
vacation, and he said it was illegal.  Hence, it being illegal.  
    Of course, the person who was doing it, no offense intended, was zipping 
almost magically into battles and other important stuff with no real way of 
knowing it.  But, if you'd like to try and make a compromise, e-mail the 
Council as a group:

Yanshosh@..., Inferno731@..., JP3884@..., KSLawDogg@...



Lord Unitron
KSLawDogg@...
